metadata.description: A project roadmap frontend built with Electron and Vite.
metadata.name: Project Roadmap Tracking Frontend

tasks.details: Install project-roadmap-tracking as peer dep and @tanstack/react-query as production dep using bun. Verify app still builds.
tasks.title: Install project-roadmap-tracking and TanStack Query

tasks.details: Install tailwindcss, @tailwindcss/vite, autoprefixer. Create tailwind.config.ts. Update electron.vite.config.ts renderer config. Replace base.css/main.css with globals.css using Tailwind directives.
tasks.title: Install and configure Tailwind CSS v4

tasks.details: Run shadcn init, configure components.json for src/renderer/src/components/ui/, create lib/utils.ts with cn() helper. Install button component to verify pipeline. Depends on Tailwind CSS setup.
tasks.title: Initialize shadcn/ui with cn() utility and first component

tasks.details: Install vitest, @testing-library/react, @testing-library/jest-dom, @testing-library/user-event, jsdom. Create vitest.config.ts, add test scripts to package.json, write smoke test.
tasks.title: Install and configure Vitest and React Testing Library

tasks.details: Create directories: src/main/ipc/, src/renderer/src/hooks/, src/renderer/src/pages/, src/renderer/src/lib/, src/renderer/src/components/ui/. Add placeholder index files.
tasks.title: Create planned directory skeleton

tasks.details: Remove electron logo, Versions.tsx, ping IPC handler, demo content from App.tsx. Replace with minimal Tailwind-styled shell. Clean up unused assets (electron.svg, wavy-lines.svg).
tasks.title: Remove scaffold demo content

tasks.details: Create wrapHandler utility in src/main/ipc/utils.ts that wraps ipcMain.handle callbacks in try/catch. Uses errorHandlerService.formatErrorMessage() to create serializable error objects for IPC boundary.
tasks.title: Create IPC error-handling wrapper utility

tasks.details: Create src/main/ipc/project.ipc.ts with handlers: prt:project:open, open-dialog, init, save, validate, stats. Import roadmapService, readConfigFile. Manage currentProjectPath state.
tasks.title: Create project IPC handlers

tasks.details: Create src/main/ipc/task.ipc.ts with handlers: prt:task:list, get, add, update, complete, pass-test, delete. Import taskService, taskQueryService, roadmapService.
tasks.title: Create task IPC handlers

tasks.details: Create src/main/ipc/deps.ipc.ts with handlers: prt:deps:get, add, remove, graph. Import taskDependencyService. Serialize DependencyGraph Map objects for IPC transfer.
tasks.title: Create dependency IPC handlers

tasks.details: Create src/main/ipc/index.ts that imports and registers all handlers from project/task/deps IPC modules. Update src/main/index.ts to call registration after app.whenReady().
tasks.title: Create IPC registration index and wire into main process

tasks.details: Rewrite src/preload/index.d.ts with full PrtAPI interface (project, task, deps, onFileChanged namespaces). Import PRT types. Define helper types: InitOptions, ListOptions, CreateTaskData, DepUpdate, DependencyInfo. Augment Window interface.
tasks.title: Define PrtAPI types and Window augmentation

tasks.details: Rewrite src/preload/index.ts to build PrtAPI object using ipcRenderer.invoke() for each channel. Namespace as window.api.project.*, task.*, deps.*. Implement onFileChanged with cleanup function. Expose via contextBridge.
tasks.title: Implement preload context bridge with full PrtAPI surface

tasks.details: Wrap App in QueryClientProvider in src/renderer/src/main.tsx. Create QueryClient with defaults: staleTime 30s, gcTime 5min, retry 1. Export client instance for file-change listener.
tasks.title: Initialize QueryClientProvider in main.tsx

tasks.details: Create src/renderer/src/lib/query-keys.ts with typed query key factory: queryKeys.project.root/stats/validation, queryKeys.tasks.root/list(filters)/detail(id), queryKeys.deps.root/detail(id)/graph. Use as const.
tasks.title: Define query key factory

tasks.details: Create src/renderer/src/hooks/use-project.ts with: useProjectStats, useProjectValidation, useOpenProject, useOpenProjectDialog, useInitProject, useSaveProject. Use query keys from factory.
tasks.title: Create project query hooks

tasks.details: Create src/renderer/src/hooks/use-tasks.ts with: useTasks(filters?), useTask(taskId), useAddTask, useUpdateTask, useCompleteTask, usePassTest, useDeleteTask. Invalidate task list + project stats on mutations.
tasks.title: Create task query hooks

tasks.details: Create src/renderer/src/hooks/use-deps.ts with: useTaskDeps(taskId), useDependencyGraph, useAddDependency, useRemoveDependency. Invalidate deps + task queries on mutations.
tasks.title: Create dependency query hooks

tasks.details: Add shadcn/ui components: card, badge, separator, scroll-area, skeleton, sonner (toast), tooltip, table. Run bunx shadcn add for each.
tasks.title: Install core shadcn/ui components

tasks.details: Add Toaster to App.tsx or layout. Create src/renderer/src/lib/toast.ts helper wrapping toast.success/error/info. Wire mutation onSuccess/onError callbacks to show toasts.
tasks.title: Set up toast notification system with Sonner

tasks.details: Create src/renderer/src/components/layout.tsx with sidebar + main content area. Sidebar has nav items (Welcome/Dashboard/Tasks) and project indicator. Use Tailwind flex layout.
tasks.title: Create app layout shell with sidebar navigation

tasks.details: Create useNavigation hook/context in src/renderer/src/hooks/use-navigation.ts managing currentPage state (welcome/dashboard/tasks). App.tsx renders Layout with appropriate page. Default to welcome when no project open.
tasks.title: Implement state-based page routing

tasks.details: Create src/renderer/src/pages/welcome.tsx. Centered landing with app title, Open Project button (useOpenProjectDialog), Initialize New Project button with name/description form. Navigate to dashboard on success.
tasks.title: Build welcome page

tasks.details: Create src/renderer/src/components/project-stats.tsx. Receives RoadmapStats props. Grid of stat cards showing counts by status, type, and priority. Color-coded badges.
tasks.title: Build project-stats component

tasks.details: Create src/renderer/src/pages/dashboard.tsx. Uses useProjectStats for data. Shows project name/description, stats cards grid, completion progress, quick action buttons (Add Task, View Tasks, Validate). Skeleton loading states.
tasks.title: Build dashboard page with stats and quick actions

tasks.details: Create src/renderer/src/components/task-list.tsx. Receives Task[] props. Table showing: status icon, priority badge, task ID, title, type badge, passes-tests indicator, dependency count. Clickable rows for detail view.
tasks.title: Build task-list component

tasks.details: Add shadcn/ui components: dialog, sheet, form, input, textarea, select, label, switch, alert-dialog. Required for task forms and detail views.
tasks.title: Install form shadcn/ui components

tasks.details: Create src/renderer/src/components/task-form.tsx. Reusable form for create/edit. Fields: title, type (select), details (textarea), priority (select), tags (text input). Pre-populate in edit mode. Client-side validation.
tasks.title: Build task-form component with create and edit modes

tasks.details: Create dialog wrapping task-form in create mode. Triggered from Tasks page Add Task button or dashboard. On success closes dialog, list auto-refreshes via query invalidation, shows toast.
tasks.title: Build create-task dialog

tasks.details: Create src/renderer/src/components/task-detail.tsx. Sheet/slide-over panel showing full task details, formatted dates, badges, dependency lists, tags. Action buttons: Edit (switches to form), Complete, Pass Test, Delete (with AlertDialog confirmation).
tasks.title: Build task-detail panel

tasks.details: Create src/renderer/src/pages/tasks.tsx. Combines task-list, create-task dialog, and task-detail panel. Uses useTasks hook. Shows loading/empty/error states. Top bar reserved for filters.
tasks.title: Build tasks page integrating list, create dialog, and detail panel

tasks.details: Add shadcn/ui components: toggle, toggle-group, popover, command, dropdown-menu. Support filter bar and search functionality.
tasks.title: Install filter-related shadcn/ui components

tasks.details: Create src/renderer/src/components/filter-bar.tsx. Status filter (toggle group), type filter (dropdown), priority filter (dropdown). Manages filter state locally, passes FilterCriteria to parent. Active filters shown as removable badges.
tasks.title: Build filter-bar component

tasks.details: Create src/renderer/src/components/search-bar.tsx. Text input with search icon and clear button. 300ms debounce before updating parent search query. Integrates with useTasks filter.search parameter.
tasks.title: Build search-bar component with debounced input

tasks.details: Update tasks page to render filter-bar and search-bar. Maintain filter/sort/search state. Pass combined ListOptions to useTasks(). Make task-list headers clickable for sort toggling (asc/desc).
tasks.title: Integrate filters, search, and column sorting into tasks page

tasks.details: Enhance task-detail.tsx with useTaskDeps(taskId). Show Depends On and Blocks lists with clickable task items. Include Add Dependency and Add Blocked buttons.
tasks.title: Add dependency lists to task-detail panel

tasks.details: Create dialog for adding dependencies with searchable task list (excluding self/already-linked). Support both depends-on and blocks relationships. Remove buttons with confirmation on each dependency item.
tasks.title: Build add and remove dependency dialogs

tasks.details: Create src/renderer/src/components/validation-panel.tsx. Uses useProjectValidation(). Shows errors/warnings with Alert and Accordion components. Categorizes by error type. Clickable task IDs. Accessible from dashboard.
tasks.title: Build validation-panel component

tasks.details: Create src/renderer/src/components/dependency-graph.tsx. Uses dagre (~30KB) for DAG layout + SVG rendering. useDependencyGraph() for data. Nodes as rectangles with task ID/title, edges as arrows. Color-coded by status. Clickable nodes.
tasks.title: Build dependency-graph visualization with dagre

tasks.details: Set up chokidar file watcher on prt.json when project is opened. On change, load updated roadmap and send prt:file:changed event to renderer. 500ms debounce. Clean up on project close/switch.
tasks.title: Implement file watcher in main process

tasks.details: In App.tsx or dedicated provider, useEffect calling window.api.onFileChanged to invalidate all queries via queryClient.invalidateQueries(). Return cleanup unsubscribe function.
tasks.title: Wire file-change listener in renderer

tasks.details: When opening a new project while one is active: stop file watcher on old project, invalidate all renderer queries, reset module-level main process state. Prevent stale data from previous project.
tasks.title: Handle project switching cleanup

tasks.details: Create test mocks matching PrtAPI interface with vi.fn() stubs. Create setup file assigning mockApi to window.api. Register in vitest.config.ts. All methods return sensible defaults.
tasks.title: Create window.api mock setup and test utilities

tasks.details: Test use-tasks, use-project, use-deps hooks using renderHook with QueryClientProvider wrapper. Assert correct window.api method calls and query invalidation behavior on mutations.
tasks.title: Write query hook tests

tasks.details: React Testing Library tests for: task-list (render, badges, row click), task-form (fill, submit, validation), task-detail (render, action buttons), filter-bar (toggle, callback payloads), project-stats (stat cards).
tasks.title: Write component tests

tasks.details: Integration tests for: welcome page (render, open project mock), dashboard (stats cards with mock data), tasks page (render with mock tasks, apply filter, verify filtered results).
tasks.title: Write page integration tests

tasks.details: Test main process IPC handlers directly (without Electron transport). Mock PRT services. Verify correct service calls and error wrapping for project.ipc, task.ipc, deps.ipc.
tasks.title: Write IPC handler unit tests

tasks.details: Configure Tailwind dark mode (class strategy). Add toggle to sidebar. Store preference in localStorage. Set up dark CSS variables in globals.css. Verify all shadcn/ui components in both modes.
tasks.title: Implement dark mode toggle with system preference detection

tasks.details: Audit all interactive elements: logical tab order, focus rings, dialog focus trapping, arrow key navigation in task list, Escape to close dialogs. Add aria-labels. Verify with VoiceOver.
tasks.title: Keyboard navigation and accessibility audit

tasks.details: Review all pages/components for consistent skeleton loading, friendly error messages with retry buttons, helpful empty states with CTAs. No raw error text shown to users.
tasks.title: Polish loading, error, and empty states across all views

tasks.details: Create proper Electron menu in src/main/index.ts. File (Open/New/Save/Quit), Edit (Undo/Cut/Copy/Paste), View (DevTools/Reload), Help (About). Wire menu items to IPC calls.
tasks.title: Create Electron application menu

tasks.details: Dynamic window title showing project name. Update index.html title from Electron to PRT. Set app icons for all platforms. Change electron-builder.yml appId to com.prt.frontend.
tasks.title: Update window title, app metadata, and appId

tasks.details: Run bun run build:mac. Verify built app launches, can open a project, all features work. Check PRT package bundled correctly. Verify CSP allows required resources. Check app size.
tasks.title: Production build verification on macOS
